name: noip Natural Dark Theme
description:
The "natural" part of the title is there because I only used colors from the website itself, nothing new was added to the color pallet.

Dark theme for NoIP. Uses the website's default colors.

user.name: GalacticSage
user.about:
Go away. 
I'm busy losing more and more braincells to sleep deprivation.

If any site administrator, or anyone who has high enough powers that you're able to delete accounts stumbles upon this account, please delete it. Since I can't find the option to do so myself.
